title: Abandon the Night
description: Quent Fielding had it all: money, power, women, good looks...until he and his friends were frozen in time for fifty years.Now he finds himself lost and alone in a new world of overgrown urban jungles.Aside from the zombies, wild animals, and survival skills, his biggest challenge is taming the sexy, elusive, sharp-tongued zombie hunter, Zoe Kapoor.
author: Colleen Gleason
